website_summaries.verdict: The Ztotop iPad Pro case is the best case for business users or anyone who needs a professional-looking case.
pros: It’s a folio, so it has a pocket that can keep important papers with your 11-inch iPad Pro
It supports magnetic charging for the Apple Pencil 2
cons: It leaves the outer edges of the iPad Pro slightly exposed

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, this one will do.
customer_reviews.text: The cover flips back and there is a strap for your hand to slid and hold. The back strap can flip over as well and it secures the covers for when traveling. You can see in my picture, I have a regular stylus in pen holder. I'm very happy and this case makes me feel more secure to have it on.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Received this case today for my 2018 iPad Pro 11inch. So far so good! Machining around the camera could have used a little more love as well as the elastic bands, but overall I’m very happy with my purchase. The iPad feels more secured and I love the concept they created with the larger band being able to hold the case closed. The pocket at the front is also magnetic, however i don’t suggest placing anything heavy. I do recommend purchasing a screen protector before putting your iPad in as a leather strap on the inside touches the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Sami V.

customer_reviews.title: It’s really pretty!
customer_reviews.text: It’s an awesome case. I’ve had it for a short time but man this case looks lovely. I decided against a keyboard case because I didn’t think it was necessary. This is protective, sturdy (so far) and man the color I got looks awesome. Definitely recommend. Update: It’s holding up very very nicely. I flip it around quite a bit and that hand strap has come in handy plenty of times.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew GastonTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Quality product but not quite as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The description said the case is compatible with the new Apple Pencil, which attaches to the side of the i-pad magnetically and, in that position, will charge from the i-pad. The case lets the pencil adhere magnetically in the intended position but it won't charge because the plastic housing that contains the i-pad apparently prevents the pencil from directly contacting the side of the i-pad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't Recommend
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an iPad Pro cover/case that will turn the device OFF when you close the lid, don't buy this one. I've had two of these now and neither one of them works. The iPad stays on after you close the lid. The listing says the magnetic on/off function is supposed to work, but it doesn't. So, the quest continues. I wish Devicewear would make a case for these iPad Pros, that's the best case I ever had for a regular iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Schatzkin

customer_reviews.title: “Beyond Expectation”
customer_reviews.text: Their motto is “Beyond Expectation,” and I must say they reach the mark! This is a quality product that is everything they advertise it to be, and it arrived on schedule. I believe you will be very pleased when one of these cases surrounds your iPad. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Piland

customer_reviews.title: great cover
customer_reviews.text: fits my ipad pro 11 very well. it is light compared to the other cover and it looks very professional. It is a perfect fit for me and the price is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: hajile

customer_reviews.title: This Does not Fit the iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: The I pad pro will not snap into the holder nor is there a retainer to keep it from falling out. Do not bother buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gene Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case
customer_reviews.text: Well made and it looks good too. Nice touches like strap to keep cover closed and a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s a solid case. I’m not typically into cases, but I decided to get one for my iPad. I honestly don’t hate this cases. It doesn’t interfere with the Apple Pencil while it is charging, but also has a loop to store the pencil if you don’t want it charging. The viewing angels when in stand mode are adequate. I enjoy that it has the elastic strap to keep it closed or to hold it open. The elastic strap wears out fairly quickly, but it’s elastic and to be expected. I would recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Labeling in amazon incorrect
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this is a perfectly good product but....it was labeled 11 inch to fit my iPad Pro that is indeed 11 inches across but your sleeve was too small to fit me device - I sent it back as it was too small altho’ the product description says “11 inches”
customer_reviews.author: wepco

customer_reviews.title: It accommodates the Apple Pencil 2 magnetic holder
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful craftsmanship, ultra thin, just big enough and not bulky. The actual iPad holder (plastic snap in) has a cutout to accommodate the magnetic catch used to store, pair and charge Apple Pencil 2. It also has a small fabric loop if you have a different brand of pencil. This is the second purchase. First one was for my wife's iPad 9.7" 6th generation. Same craftsmanship, with a fabric loop to hold the first generation Apple Pencil. NOTE: Different model iPads use different pencils... but this case can accommodate either with the magnetic catch for iPad Pro/Pencil 2 or others...
customer_reviews.author: Johnny D.

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting smell to it
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is cheap and it has a really bad odor. I’ve been using the case for a couple of months hoping the smell would eventually go away because I really loved the style of the case. But unfortunately the smell is still around after 2 months. The odor is awful and I’m embarrassed to pull out my iPad in class because the odor is also unfortunately really strong too.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: It seems to protect pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately I haven't had a drop event, so I cannot assure this will protect my iPad from a fall, but it surprised me positively. It it well built, iPad snaps easily into position and the cover provides an easy way to have the screen at several angles. Opening it is sometimes requires some tweaking to place the iPad in the desired slot, but I wouldn't count it as a fault. It's more an issue of getting accustomed to handling it. The finish looks nice and gives the iPad a distinguished appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Vier

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very reasonably priced and is very pleasing to the eye. It has the sleeve which is a nice touch and the handle as well. It fits the IPad Pro like a glove. My only reservation is whether with the case open it will adequately protect the IPad in a frontal screen first or corner fall. Fortunately to date I haven’t inadvertently placed the IPad to the test. I would recommend this cover with my reservation as noted. I have purchased this cover for two different models of IPads.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Be aware this series is a fraud
customer_reviews.text: Says on cover it's made for iPhone 10.5 inch. Scheme
customer_reviews.author: Mrschwartz

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this case, I loved the look, loved the feel and couldn't find anything wrong with it. After only have my iPad pro for 30 days with this case I dropped it and found out the case doesn't protect as I had hoped. I am now spending more money to have my iPad sent in to have a new screen put on it after it cracked in two different place. I was hoping for more from this case, at least a little protect against a drop. If you want looks and don't care about protection, this is your case. If your looking for protection against cracks you will need to look elsewhere because this isn't your case.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Farm Chick

customer_reviews.title: Great look. Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great and it has been durable. I use my iPad every day for most of the day. The biggest problem with this cover is a MAJOR deal breaker, it smells really, really bad. I did see one more review that mentioned the same thing. I don’t know if it is the plastic, the glue used, the finish, or something else; regardless, the smell is so bad, I have to buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Belmares

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice for the Price, but Not Quite Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This case is sharp, well made, and a great value for the price! Only three issues for me: The cover doesn’t quite lay flat, which detracts from the sharp look (and the idea that I have a great iPad Pro in a stylish case!); the inside-cover material isn’t as soft as I’d like (to be pressed up against the screen when the folio is closed); and the front pocket holds 8.5” x 11” paper inserted on the short-edge, sticking out of the pocket (which makes sense, of course, since the iPad and the folio aren’t 11+” tall, but just makes carrying any regular-size documents awkward). Despite these issues, I’m still very pleased with this purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: JRMlaw

customer_reviews.title: NOT for the 2018 iPad 11"
customer_reviews.text: This does NOT fit the 11 inch 2018 iPad. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. G

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits the 2018 iPad Pro perfectly and is a serviceable cover. The leather material looks good and provides a slot for a few pieces of paper or identification. The "stops" provide a usable easel feature and there is a strap for holding the iPad if that is your wish. When the auto-shut-off did not work correctly on the first cover received, the seller quickly provided a working replacement. The only "con" I would mention is that the strength of the cover may not withstand hard use, but that may not be an issue for casual users. Ultimately for the cost, this is an excellent iPad cover.
customer_reviews.author: Computer User

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple, practical, protective case
customer_reviews.text: Protective case, sturdy. Holds the iPad Pro 11” quite nicely, and it’s great to have a holder for the Apple Pencil. I can’t really speak to durability because I haven’t had it long enough, but the plastic that holds the iPad is the thick, non-fragile kind, so I don’t believe it would crack should I drop the case. There’s elastic to hold the case together when closed, and elastic you can slip your hand into to hold the iPad in portrait mode when you want to read. In landscape orientation, there are three ridges on the inside of the case to hold the iPad at three different angles. I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad Pro Cover
customer_reviews.text: Recently got two iPad Pros and got this cover for each of them. They are lightweight, but sturdy. The iPad is protected. Both cover very attractive. The folding stand has multiple positions. The features on it (like strap and elastic) make it very easy to hold with one hand while using. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Bubca

customer_reviews.title: Quality Leather. Looks Smart and Professional.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the brown color, and it happens to perfectly match my expensive Skully leather folio that I use for work. Skully calls this color "Cognac." It's reddish brown. But they're the same color. Not too red, and definitely not gaudy. Mostly brown. The quality of the leather is almost as good on the iPad cover as on my Skully folio. The folio in truth is a bit softer, but I'm not complaining. Considering how expensive the iPad was, I didn't want to cheapen the look with a low end cover. This cover is more than adequate, yet actually was inexpensive. I'll take it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Redesign for the iPad Pro not as padded
customer_reviews.text: Still the best case for the money but because the new iPad Pro screen is to the edge they have to use a plastic snap in in the enclosure which make them less padded. But i do not think you will do better anywhere else for this price. It is just import to know this if you have bought this same brand for earlier models of iPad and think you are going to get the same unit. This design is different than previous designs of the same look.
customer_reviews.author: RJDH

customer_reviews.title: great case for the price
customer_reviews.text: this is a great case for the price. it looks stylish and I like the pocket for holding loose papers. The pen holder is nice and tight so I never worry about losing my pen if it's in there. The only con to this case is the protectability. I had the case open and accidentally knocked it off the table, the iPad came right out, face down on the floor. luckily nothing broke but I had a near heart attack. I wish the case was a little more secure and protective. But it's good for looks and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking, good price.
customer_reviews.text: iPad Pro 11” (2018) fits nicely and offers built-in angle slats for the horizontal position. Room for for the Apple Pencil magnatized on the side. Has a stretchable handle to hold iPad, and slot to insert a few folded papers. Turns iPad off when closed. Kind of heavy overall, but I was used to Apple’s lightweight iPad Air magnetic front cover. Didn’t want Apple’s expensive built-in keyboard cover because when it’s folded back you’re always pressing against the keyboard. I use a pyramid pillow to support the vertical position.
customer_reviews.author: Borderlight

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had another case for my iPad 11 Pro that I returned because it was too bulky. The iPad pro is slim and sleek, I wanted a case to compliment that. This one is perfect. I love the leather finish and how slim it is when closed. The stand works great and has 4 options for angle of the screen. I has a holder for the apple pencil and is open on the side for charging the pencil The only downside is that it doesn't rotate to portrait mode, but that's what made the other case so bulky. I highly recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome case!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case since the price was more reasonable than others. It turns out the case is better than the others! I like the nice looking leather type cover, and the fact that it fits my iPad pro perfectly. The case lets the Pro snap into it and it has the exact cutouts you need for the camera, speakers, etc. There are 3 angles for adjusting the viewing angle. I wish someone would make a velcro type adjusting like there used to be on one specific case that isn't sold anymore. I highly recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: D.R.  Harris

customer_reviews.title: beautiful cover!
customer_reviews.text: love the color! deep caramel color. looks rich and feels very nice and smooth. the stitch work all around the cover front and back is clean and even. the material inside of cover is a greyish color, feels soft, textured, has a rubber like feel. doesn't leave any markings on ipad. the elastic band also holds the covers shut. band is similar to journals. the cover offers good protection. feels strong, not filmsy. it will last a long time. fits the ipad pro 11 without any problems. very happy with purchase. great price!
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought an iPad Pro 11 inch at Best Buy. I also purchased a Targus case like the one I had on my previous iPad. It was very expensive when compared to this case. The Ztorop case was MUCH less expensive, had the same features as the Targus and has proven to be a very functional and sturdy case! I am very pleased with my purchase and would highly recommend it to anyone purchasing the latest model iPad Pro.
customer_reviews.author: S Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It is the best around case for me.
customer_reviews.text: I had a case similar to this before. I like the way it stands up on a table for reading. I also had one that folded and the piece that held it up wasn't very high. I do like they a strap on it that will keep it closed. It light weight and holds the iPad securely. The case protects the pencil but not completely. But you can always slide it in the pocket if you are afraid it might get bumped off. I just received this case but I am confident it will hold up well over time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Plastic materials on case disintegrate quickly so IPad falls out of the case.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic tray that holds the IPad is very cheap, and not durable at all. Purchased this mid-Dec 2019 and it has become brittle and has had pieces crumble off that are supposed to hold the IPad in. I have never dropped this nor left in a hot or cold environment. Ironically it is generally in my house safe and sound. I purchased based on reviews and I loved the look and cleverness of the case until it began to fall apart after only about 8 months. Would NOT recommend unless the materials improve!
customer_reviews.author: Teri J.

customer_reviews.title: Not enough padding in base fold
customer_reviews.text: Case looks excellent, the pen holder was not moved as was reported by vendor to facilitate pen charging . The case is hard to hold in one hand while viewing it without stand. There just isn't enough soft padding to protect between the thumb and 1st finger. All the other ipads had no issue with this, but it must be something to do with the larger viewing surface.
customer_reviews.author: vegasbob

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t need a keyboard...
customer_reviews.text: I seldom write reviews, but was motivated to share my thoughts on the Ztotop case which I’ve been using about a month. This is, by far, the best iPad case out of a handful I’ve had over the years. Positives (1) looks good (2) thin, but sturdy (3) great way of attaching the iPad without covering any of the screen (4) positive feel, solid feel when closing the case. iPad always turns off (5) effective stand with a variety of viewing angles (6) functional loop as added security attaching the pen. Also, I don’t see the need for a screen protector. Great value, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: bought because it said it charged pencil, it doesn't. UPDATE: problem fixed, free replacement
customer_reviews.text: Update: customer service emailed me and said they fixed the problem with the pencil charging and now I can say it does work (not when in the elastic holder, but that makes sense, it does stick to side while charging). So good customer service and now works as advertised. Changing to 5 stars. the pencil sticks to the folio through a cut out but it's not big enough to charge it, which was whole reason I got it. Pretty annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great looks, comfortable and offers protection when traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this case, returned another brand. This one is perfect for my use. Good looking, adds very little weight and is comfortable to hold. For the price, you really csn’t go wrong with this. Great protection for travel. Based upon the quality of this one, I just might purchase the very thin Smart Cover by the same company as well. The cost of both is 1/2 the price of one genuine Apple Smart Cover. I strongly suggest giving this one a try. There is one thing to note. If you are use to the trifold smart covers, that offer a typing angle. This case does not offer that option.
customer_reviews.author: John Scott

customer_reviews.title: Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.text: My second of this brand (for a different sized iPad). Love the colors, durability and style. As soon as I switched iPads, I immediately purchased this same brand because of my previous positive experience
customer_reviews.author: M. Dziminski

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with how well-made this cover appears to be. It looks great! It went on easily and the groves for standing up my ipad keep it in the desired position. I love the strap which allows me to walk with it without concern for dropping or it being knocked out of my hands. I paid way too much for the one Apple sells for the ipad with the keyboard, but it was too bulky and the keyboard was problematic when I did not want to use it. This one is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my iPad Pro safe
customer_reviews.text: Using this case on the 11” iPad Pro for a few days I am seeing where the cover does not consistently shut off the screen. You have to push on the cover and often flip it over with the back on top to turn off the screen. The cover isn’t perfectly straight. Otherwise the case gets the job done and snuggly secures the iPad. Update: I received a replacement folio from the vendor and this one work as expected. The cover snaps closed and shuts off the screen. Thank you for terrific customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Duebner

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Case at a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: What a pleasant surprise receiving this case was. I was looking for a nice case for my new iPad Pro, and quite frankly was looking for something that I felt was reasonabley priced. I saw several cases on Amazon, and this one just looked a little nicer, in my eyes..... but I really wasn't expecting that much. Well, it showed up, made out of a very attractive leather, my iPad fits into it perfectly, and it feels good in my hand. It is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: JJF

customer_reviews.title: Good product with one problem
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, I like the outside pocket and the fact that it holds my 2018 iPad Pro 11” without covering the thin bezel. On downside, a big reason I chose this product is the strap on the back that I thought would make it easy to hold my iPad with one hand. However, each end of the strap is attached to the case with an elastic fabric that seems too thin to hold up for long and is too stretchy to firmly hold the device with one hand with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: G. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and looks great
customer_reviews.text: i love the case, I bought one for my iPad Pro 1st gen and the. For my iPad Pro 2nd gen. The material is good for what you pay. It protect the iPad good enough but definitely not for kinds. You can carry the pencil without putting it on the loop but I prefer putting it in the loop holder, plus it also charges while it’s in there ;). Screen protecter fits!
customer_reviews.author: julio rosas

customer_reviews.title: Needs a tighter hand strap.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case except I wish the hand strap was tighter. It has elastic on the top and bottom which makes it too loose. When I hold it with one hand, which is the point of this design, I thought, the iPad sort of sits diagonally. It’s not quite as useful as I’d hoped. But it’s a nice case otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Preston

customer_reviews.title: Auto wake/sleep mode does not work
customer_reviews.text: The iPad fits very well into the plastic holder and the feel of the leather case exterior is good. However, as stated earlier, the auto wake/sleep capability does not work as stated. Still a nice case for the money. Update: Great customer service. Ztotop sent a replacement case to me and the wake/sleep functionality works great. It really is a very good case for the money. Great value. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C Morick

customer_reviews.title: This is the Best Case, So I Ordered It Again!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this leather case. For the same cost, most of the leather cases are usually the synthetic type. But you can tell that this is real leather. I have got many great comments on it. It looks professional. The sleep wake mode work very well. This would probably be the most satisfied sale you make.
customer_reviews.author: The Review

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and protective case. Would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this iPad case because I thought the brown leather looked good and it looks even better than I imagined. The stand comes in very handy, looks and feels great as well. This case is awesome, you definitely won’t be disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and feels nice. I still struggle to hold it up but when you have it landscape mode the ridges on the case work wonderful. It has an elastic handle on the left side. Wish it had it on both sides. The pencil hold works but when you put a cover on the pensil it does not fit on the pencil hold anymore. I like the case and it does what it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Y@ry

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I love this case! Is everything I’ve been looking for. I love the nice faux leather feel and look. I also like the handle on the back to hold the iPad while reading books. This case is also very stylish and one of the few fólios that holds an Apple Pencil.
customer_reviews.author: A Fan

customer_reviews.title: fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The case is holding up very nicely, and the quality is pretty solid. It also comes w/ a slot where you can put a Apple pencil on the case as well. it also has a different slot where you can adjust the screen vertically at different degree which's really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Yi Peng

customer_reviews.title: Nice case...
customer_reviews.text: Great case for the price, feels smooth to the touch. Doesn’t hold fingerprints and is easy to clean. There is enough room for The Apple Pencil 2 to fit to the iPad Pro on the side of the case. Or you can use the loop. The iPad Pro fits easily in and out of the case. It looks professional and expensive. ( Apple sticker not included)
customer_reviews.author: MEB

customer_reviews.title: Beat my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really nice. It looks like a regular leather-bound portfolio that you would take with you to an interview. And the 'leather' is very supple... it actually makes me want to find reasons to use the iPad just so I can hold this thing.
customer_reviews.author: J.V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but doesn't charge pencil
customer_reviews.text: The case is sturdy and seems well made. There is an elastic band to hold an Apple pencil, but it doesn't allow for a connection to charge the pencil when not in use. There doesn't seem to be a way to charge the pencil at all while the iPad is in this case. Another case that I purchased has an Apple pencil holder built into the side so the pencil is able to charge, so that is the one my iPad lives in.
customer_reviews.author: Hey

customer_reviews.title: Might be my favorite purchase of 2019
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case for over 2 months now and it is holding up great. It is a very sturdy case that had protected my iPad Pro 11 very well whenever I take it somewhere. I like the viewing angles because I watch YouTube, Hulu, Netflix, Prime on it. The leather version is very professional looking.
customer_reviews.author: CandyNJ

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing problem with these - do not buy. It may cost you $500 in repairs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. Unfortunately, there is a serious manufacturing problem with both of them. The iPad does not sit properly into the case as one of the corner fittings is not deep enough to lock/secure the iPad in place. I had one of the iPads come loose because of this issue and cost $500 to repair the glass. Interestingly enough, the problem is with the bottom right fitting in one of the cases and top right fitting on the other case. I would definitely not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: meprof57

customer_reviews.title: This case beats other case's in terms of price and quality. Great !!!
customer_reviews.text: This case for iPad Pro 11 inch is made with excellent material quality, flexible, and very comfort to handle when used in the iPad. The case easily fits into the iPad, offers all side protection, charges Apple Pencil seamlessly, wakes & puts the iPad to sleep mode by opening and closing the case. The cost of this case beats all other case's both in terms of price and quality. Greatly appreciate the workmanship on the design and making of this case. Highly recommend this case for those looking to protect the iPad from dust, drop and damage. This case purchase has drawn my attention to Ztotop. Good job, well done Ztotop.
customer_reviews.author: SLReview

customer_reviews.title: Secure Case
customer_reviews.text: This case offers nice protection for the iPad Pro 11". I like the protection offered in the corners of this product to be helpful in the event of an unexpected drop. The elastic pencil holder works well in offering extra stability of the Apple Pencil when it is not charging. Overall a nice and functional case for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brendij

customer_reviews.title: Excellent at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in a timely manner. My i-Pad Pro 11 inch clipped into the plastic folio liner with ease and is a secure fit. This is a very good, no frills case in an attractive faux leather finish. The fit is excellent. The covers closes with a rather weak magnet so using the elastic strap to secure the closure is probably a good idea. Works as advertised, can't comment on durability but it probably will outlast the technology it carries...
customer_reviews.author: Stevn8or

customer_reviews.title: Quality case
customer_reviews.text: This is my second case from this company and I love it. The only reason I needed to buy another was because my toddler colored my last one with a paint marker and it can’t be removed. 🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Jess Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but holding strap size and placement isn’t ideal
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think this is a good value, but the holding strap on the back is too thin and placed too low on the tablet. I prefer to use a one handed strap while taking notes or drawing. I will keep it until I find something that suits my needs better.
customer_reviews.author: sandytoz

customer_reviews.title: The pencil charges
customer_reviews.text: Great case for the money. I was waiting to get the new iPad Pro until I could find a case that had the features I wanted and here it is! This case feels great in my hands and is very versatile in the ways that I can hold the pad. Perfect. positioning for reading, viewing and typing and it allows my Pencil to attach and charge. Seems very well made.
customer_reviews.author: S. Back

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase so far
customer_reviews.text: I'm only a few days in, but happy with new cover for iPad pro 11". Holder for pencil is handy without relying on magnetic attachment to iPad. The leather like finish is professional and I'm using it all day in a clinical setting. I have yet to put on screen protector purchased separately but feel reasonably protected at this point. I bought zugu cover for iPads that patients use for signing in with more strength, but I think this one is friendlier and nice price point for my personal use in office and home.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Durham

customer_reviews.title: Warped after a few days and got worse and worse
customer_reviews.text: The cover was quite beautiful, until I started to use it. I use my ipad several hours a day. When I am not holding it, I put it down on a flat surface. I use it indoors and have never got it wet. Yet after a few days, the front cover started to curve. Now, at about 30 days there is a 1/2 gag between the cover and the surface of the ipad.
customer_reviews.author: J.LB. - NJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product, especially at this price...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the leather is very good. It looks great and is sturdy. The leather finish is pretty nice. My iPad Pro 11 fits nicely. The pencil loop is in kind of a weird spot. I think it assumes you stick it to the side when you can but put it on the side of the ipad when charging. When in the loop it sticks out beyond the ipad. I ended up adding a loop to the cover side. The pocket on the outside is big enough for a thin pad. Overall happy enough that I bought a second cover in black.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Did not work with Ipad Pro camera
customer_reviews.text: Pictures / description show that this will work with the new iPad Pro 11". Unfortunately, this product covers one of the cameras. I was pleased with the quality, but does not fit correctly.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Six

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case because it is good quality along with a great price. This case has a nice feel to it and when I prop it up it holds its position without falling down. I also love the little pocket fold on the case.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and is as described.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be an excellent value for the price. It is new and looks expensive and while using it horizontally to read it is secure in the indents provided. I have no complaints but assume the elastic band to secure it closed will stretch and eventually need to be removed but that still would not stop me from ordering this again. Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Les Krieke

customer_reviews.title: A nice well fitting case for newest iPad...
customer_reviews.text: The case finish is very well done. Really nothing to complain about. The front pocket a nice touch and actually looks nice. The little hand hold straps on the case aren't really necessary but someone may like them. Overall the case is a good bang for the buck and fits the iPad very well, it’s all I need...
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: after using for a while, the cover tilts
customer_reviews.text: At the very beginning, the case covers the iPad seamlessly. However, after being used for a while, the cover deforms a little bit so the cover is not in full contact with the screen when closed, although it still can put iPad into the sleep mode.
customer_reviews.author: ILoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Looks good & very durable!
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned this case for 10.5 iPad Pro. After 18 months of daily very hard use it only showed minor fraying along inside edge. I was so impressed by it's durability I bought an identical model for a new iPad 11 Pro. Great value for the money. I've purchased more expensive leather folio cases that lacked this product's durability.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Chluski

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Case
customer_reviews.text: My husband has this case already but wanted another one as a backup because he likes it so much! He’s very picky and this case past his picky test. It’s durable and hold the tablet securely while looking nice at the same time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: i love this product! i already bought from this company twice, the other one is for my ipad 7th gen.. my only concern is about the logo in front. when the case for my ipad pro 11 came, the logo infront says benazcap, then for my ipad 7th gen says ztotop.. idk if they're the same company brand but when i compared the product they are truly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Defensor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these now. Not because they break but for different family members. The quality is amazing for the price. As well easy to hold and use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: One of the best iPad covers!
customer_reviews.text: Best iPad cover I’ve owned. I’ve had about 7 iPads so I have gone through a few different covers. This one takes the 1st place prize for sure! Its sturdy, doesnt smell, di
customer_reviews.author: Jerele55

customer_reviews.title: Fits and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Got iPad Pro for wife for Christmas and ordered this with it. She LOVES it. It is easy to use, has multiple slots for different angles of standing, connects to the iPad easily and seems well made. I've honestly never seen a case made any better, and we've had a few. For the price, I'd buy one of these every time.
customer_reviews.author: 'Zilla

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic case, fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: Ztotop has crafted an amazing case that has a great feel, build and look for the new iPad 2018. Has an open area for the pencil to attach as well as a slot to carry it via the case. The upright positions are good, just wish there was one more, but that is such a minor nitpick. Fantastic, and kudos to them on this new case!
customer_reviews.author: Jason R Bender

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Impressive case for the price. Especially when I heard about how easily this new iPad bends. This case has a hard plastic where you mount your iPad, then is covered with premium leather. Best part is, it supports apple pencil 2 charging and has a pencil holder so you don't have to keep on charging your pencil on the side
customer_reviews.author: NUBi

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This fits my iPad perfectly and it covers all the corners as well. The front and back are a leather like material so it gives it protect from accidental drops and it has a cut out for the iPad Pencil when it is charging and a holder for when you are done using it so it would be more secure
customer_reviews.author: Kristle

customer_reviews.title: Love This Case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It’s sturdy. It stays in place, does not flop down when in horizontal position. I have purchased 3 different colors of this case. Plus it has a nice leather feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but it won’t close flat anymore
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed in this case. It’s starting to bend outwards, so it won’t close flat and my iPad will not go to sleep. Only had it about three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Brensinger

customer_reviews.title: Top rapport qualité prix
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, elegant simplicity executed with precision and durable quality. The magnetic case attachment maintains a secure hold of the 11" iPad Pro without the slightest hint of slippage through rigorous jostling. However, this case is not for Butterfingers, as the absence of corners and sides that facilitate appreciation of Apple design language exposes them to the physical elements... choose wisely.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Brand new & corner piece broke
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product is my second time buying. Previous got too old of use. And I was very happy with the new style until I was holding it and then I had a piece of plastic n my hand. The bottom corner that protects my IPad Pro just fell off/broke days after I received it. Not happy about it because I don’t want anything to happen to my IPad but now I’m not sure if this brand new case will protect my IPad if i drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Get this for you new iPad pro 11.
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding case for the money. My wife enjoys the rich look and the added use of fixed positions for viewing or typing. She loves that it has an Apple Pencil holder even though you have to remove the pencil to charge it. It's a great stand and protective cover. I'm glad I waited for this one!
customer_reviews.author: PapaGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second case I have purchased. The first is still great, but I received a new, different size iPad so I needed another case. Never even looked at another case because I was so please with the first Zyotop case I purchased. I highly recommend this case. Nice looking, great leather and I love the way the ipad snaps into the case. Have never had a problem with it coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Dressage Ryder

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CASE
customer_reviews.text: Great, quality case for my iPad and makes it look very professional when I use it in public. High quality material, great fit, and great screen cover
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs! The case is a sleek design and the viewing angles are good! It definitely feels just as good if not better than some of those higher priced leather cases. It feels protective with the hard plastic covering just where it needs to on the sides, top & bottom. Not sure how it will work with glass screen protector yet but will be trying that soon. I might buy in other colors however this brown is professional yet fashionable! I will be checking more stuff out from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The case is durable and will protect my iPad Pro. Nice looking and very sophisticated. I could easily take it to work as it looks like a professional item.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Duck

customer_reviews.title: Plastic clips broke within eight months, not real leather
customer_reviews.text: I am very careful with my equipment and the case retaining clips started to break one at a time. Now it's time to buy a new case before my iPad falls out. On another point, the case is NOT leather, it's a synthetic material.
customer_reviews.author: Tåz

customer_reviews.title: Will not stand vertically
customer_reviews.text: This cover will not stand vertically. This is important as some apps such as Hoopla, Instagram etc will not rotate to landscape view. The iPad itself is pretty heavy when you have to hold it in vertical position the entire time you are reading an ebook or watching a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny, best case I’ve ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: This case really shocked me! I work in wireless and I am used to having a name brand/higher quality cases. This case has everything you need and seems to really protect the tab. I love having the option of different viewing angles, a slide to help hold the tab and also the string to keep the tab closed. The case is exactly as pictured and I’m very very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Based on all the positive reviews, I bought this one and wasn't disappointed.Over the years, I bought many shells until I found one that met my standards.This is the first case I bought for my new machine, and I won't look for it again.It's absolutely perfect in every way -- solid, sturdy, good quality, good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Markenous Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Quality cover
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect! Looks great, high quality. I LOVE it. I can’t speak on durability because I just opened it, but if the quality of craftsmanship is an indicator I would bet it’s durable. It’s absolutely great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very practical ipad protective shell
customer_reviews.text: Its appearance is generous, the color is elegant and the leather fabric is very comfortable to hold in the hand. It can wrap the ipad in all directions and bring enough security to protect the ipad. It can adjust the viewing angle from multiple angles and have good support. After wearing it My ipad no longer has to worry about being easily scratched on the panel. I believe it has excellent protection.
customer_reviews.author: Anisa

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this case. A nice professional look. Especially like the selection of 3 slots to hold iPad at different viewing angles. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Profession looking sturdy 11 Pro case
customer_reviews.text: The case is professional looking and the 3 notches for viewing angles are perfect. In addition, it stays put in the notches. No more slipping and falling like other cases I’ve tried. Protects the screen and the auto screen on/off feature is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ammie

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it cost more than it did.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and stylish for a fraction of the cost compared to others. Definitely worth getting. If you are on the fence about buying it, buy it. I was going to buy some other brand going for over fifty but after trying this one I’m amazed at the quality and price.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fit and finish for an all-around multi-purpose case for your iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: This case is phenomenal at this price. Fit and functionality are great and it is stylish as well. I cannot speak to durability, but if this case can withstand normal wear and tear it will surpass any expectations of a sub $30 case.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case; fits my new iPad Pro perfectly. It has a small holder for the pencil on the side which works well. It seems sturdy and I have used it for almost a month now and been very happy with it. Ordering and delivering was easy and very quick.
customer_reviews.author: T. B. Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not the size it listed
customer_reviews.text: I found & ordered it after searching for the specific case that would fit an older & larger model ipad Pro. This came up in the results. Its very handsom and lovely in feel. It was also 3 inches too small all the way around. Found one that actually fits the model I have and used to search. It is nice though, maybe for a mini?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Sleep Mode
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t have a sleep mode like it said, which was very disappointing! I have purchased these before for other iPads and they DID have a sleep mode. I wouldn’t have bought this one if I had known that the sleep mode didn’t work. Good sturdy case though with good viewing angles.
customer_reviews.author: KP

product_meta.title: Ztotop Case for iPad Pro 11 Inch 2018 Release, Premium Leather Slim Multiple Viewing Angles Folding Stand Cover with Auto Wake/Sleep (Support 2nd Gen Apple Pencil Wireless Charging), Canvas Black
feature_bullets: PLEASE NOTE - Exclusively designed for iPad Pro 11 inch 2018 ( Model: A1980/A2013/A1934/A1979) Case precise cut-outs and easy access to touch screen, side buttons, charging, headset and camera ports, will NOT FIT other iPad models.
Extra cut out for 2nd Gen iPad Pencil: The iPad Pencil can be attached magnetically, charged and paired when your iPad Pro 11 tablet is placed inside this case.
Auto Wake & Sleep Feature – Magnetic smart cover supports auto wake & sleep function. Automatically wakes or puts your device to sleep when the lid is opened and closed.
Premium Graded Material - Excellent workmanship with premium quality nylon woven fabric exterior and soft microfiber interior lining.Built in leather hand strap, pencil holder and organizer pocket.
Multi-functional Features- Multiple slots able to set up multiple horizontal stand angles for watching movie or typing.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,465 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
